title: Can we get public match spectate back please?
body:
I don't always wanna log onto LoL and play, sometimes I like to just watch other people play instead.

We used to be able to watch/spectate other people's matches through the panel on the client that is dedicated for public match spectating. But it's sadly no longer the case.

Sure we can still just watch the friends' matches instead, but still, having the panel back would be nice since it's like a TV with a couple channels and you can always look for the ones that tickle your fancy rather than being limited to whatever that goes on in your friend-list where you have no knowledge about the match-up until you've already dived in. Not to mention, the public spectate is usually on 24/7 so whenever you wanna watch some games, you can; the same can't be said about your friend-list, as it's typically the case that they go down past 12 in the morning.

So can we please have that back?

Or is it back on the new client, I haven't got around using it yet. What I'm trying to get to is that the public spectating is a feature I really like and would like it to stay permanently on the League client.
